doc.title: Fann Adventure

credit.role: Himself - Co-host of Fann Adventure - South Africa
Himself - Co-host of Fann Adventure - Malaysia

doc.plot: Fann Wong goes on an extended trip to South Africa and Malaysia in this special documentary which chronicles her travels in Johannesburg, Durban, Lesotho, the Table Mountains and a whole host of other remote and exotic locations including nationally-gazetted wildlife conservation parks and desolate villages. She gets to visit poor families, live in tree-houses, beat drums, and totally sheds her inhibitions in white-water rafting and cooking potjkie with African wines.
